        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              char displayChar,

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        Select and return an action to perform on the current turn. Check if player is concentrating at his target in current turn and add suitable actions into menu to be chosen by player to perform for current turn.
        Overrides:
        playTurn in class ZombieActor
        Parameters:
        actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
        lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
        map - the map containing the Actor
        display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • hurt

        public void hurt(int points)
        Do some damage to the Player. The player lose its concentration to target when being hurt.
        Overrides:
        hurt in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        points - number of hitpoints to deduct.
